name: 2020.01/ProjetoI/Gigel Wars
description:
Mankind needs you to finish the alien attackers and retrieve our home. The year is 2084, humanity discovered a revolutonary way of harvesting solar energy, colonizing the  solar system.    In 2159, Gigels, an insect-like  alien race, escapes their  home-system after the Aegir  star went supernova, the solar system being their  only hope, when they arrived  the Gigels acted hostile against humanity forcing  a full-scale war between  the races.  It's your job, as the Human  race avenger to slay the Gigels in the  Solar System and free  our home.

Royalty Free Music from Bensound
